effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move. In particular, it hits through disguise
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move. In particular, it hits through disguise
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move. In particular, it hits through disguise

flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.
